jump_scares.spoiler: The camera begins to shake and there is a loud bang followed by a high pitched whining noise
Niko, wearing a pig mask, suddenly appears beside Zoe
Hands appear beneath a door during a dream Zoe is having
The previously dead dog suddenly jumps up on the table and barks
Clay is startled by a loud crash coming from another room
Clay stands up and the dog barks at him, having suddenly appeared on top of the table
The dog appears directly in front of Clay
Zoe surprises Frank while he is at his computer
Frank turns around and the previously dead Zoe now appears to be sitting up underneath the sheet
The mirror in front of Zoe cracks
Zoe opens her eyes and they are black
An unseen force pushes Niko into a cabinet
One of the shrouded bodies suddenly jumps up
The lights cut out briefly, when they come back on Zoe is standing right beside Frank
The record player suddenly turns on and begins to play opera music
Frank is shocked back to life
